FuncDef: The display segment-policy applied-record command displays the application status of a microsegmentation grouping policy. The display segment-policy applied-record command displays the application status of a microsegmentation grouping policy. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of characters. The value is a slot ID.
